慢性耳部感染与儿童持久的大脑和语言缺陷有关耳朵感染是一种常见的童年经历，但一项新的研究表明，父母应该认真对待这些感染，以保护孩子的语言发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Chronic-ear-infections-linked-to- permanent-brain-and-language-deficits-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Chronic-ear-infections-linked-to- permanent-brain-and-language-deficits-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=994dabac-5495-49bd-a289-cc21f486862a Thu, 04 Jan 2024 04:55:31 -0500 Chronic ear infections linked to lasting brain and language deficits in children

新化合物可有效对抗对多种现有抗生素产生耐药性的细菌物种Zampaloni 等人的最新研究。和帕希尔等人。发表在《自然》杂志上的文章描述了一种抑制革兰氏阴性细菌（例如不动杆菌）生长的新方法，该方法使用由大环肽组成的抗生素，该抗生素针对将脂多糖从细胞质运输到外膜的细菌蛋白桥机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/New-compound- effective-against-bacterial-species-pressive-to-multiple-classes-of-existing-antibiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/New-compound- effective-against-bacterial-species-pressive-to-multiple-classes-of-existing-antibiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02d63717-67f1-4389-830b-26672a7298e1 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 04:05:00 -0500 New compound effective against bacterial species resistant to multiple classes of existing antibiotics

妊娠体重和血液标记物可以预测妊娠期糖尿病的不良结局研究人员表示，妊娠期糖尿病 (GDM) 女性血液中测量的妊娠体重和生化标志物与不良妊娠结局风险增加有关，这为精准诊断提供了新的方向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Pregnancy-weight-and-blood-markers-may-predict-poor-outcomes-for-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Pregnancy-weight-and-blood-markers-may-predict-poor-outcomes-for-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=298aa557-b1c4-408a-a4dc-6acb24f2e65f Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:26:16 -0500 Pregnancy weight and blood markers may predict poor outcomes for gestational diabetes
